title: Emerald and Diamond Royal Haaram - Pachala Pathakala Haaram
features: Exquisite three-strand Haaram featuring meticulously set Polki diamonds and vibrant green emerald beads. The central pendant showcases a geometric design centered around a large emerald cabochon, surrounded by intricate diamond detailing. The pendant's lower section features a cluster of smaller emeralds and diamonds, creating a tiered effect. The links of the haaram incorporate geometric diamond-studded elements alternating with rows of emerald beads. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
description: A breathtaking statement piece, this Royal Haaram blends traditional design with exceptional gemstone quality. The lustrous Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's richness, while the vivid green emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings. Uncut diamonds (Polki) provide a timeless antique charm. This Haaram is a treasured heirloom, embodying South Indian cultural heritage and representing an investment in enduring beauty.
